html:
5.24.20  6:16 pm   How can I be as creative as you?

      try to do everything and then get knocked flat on your face by how many things there actually are

5.24.20  4:57 pm   Your music has meanings that are hidden behind silly wordplay. How did you find this out?

      i don't think it's very hidden. word play is there, but it doesn't obscure anything. also the way i found out was it was me who put it there

5.24.20  4:26 pm   Will you ever do a production breakdown video where you show and talk about your creation process and let us meet you behind the scenes?

      yes

5.24.20  2:59 pm   What software are you learning?

      none, the tables have turned and now i am teaching things to the software

5.24.20  2:30 pm   Browsing through this section i found some mathematical references, you talked about converging series and upper bounds and I loved it bc I'm in love with mathematics, but I know you because of your beautiful work with music and animation. My question is: What place does maths take in your life and your work?

      i guess i'm not sure where i would draw the line between math and not math

5.24.20  2:18 pm   have you ever made a song in an odd time signature

      well, ...... odd time signatures are most often used as transitions. i do that all the time. what is more rare, is a song in an odd time signature (besides 3) that stays in that same time signature, like as much as a 4 song stays in 4. and i have done that also, but less often. What is slightly more common than that, i think for other people, and also for me, is to use odd time signatures and keep changing them constantly.

5.24.20  2:05 pm   Why am I scared of rocks

      maybe you are finding yourself unable to predict just what they will do next

5.24.20  1:20 pm   I'm very confused. One person asked if they were a unicorn, and you said 'Everything is a unicorn' But THEN somebody asked 'Is (insert food) a/an (insert food) and you answered '(insert food) is nothing. This does not add up.

     as the number of questions approaches infinity, we find that it is indeed correct

      This is not very clear to me. Does anything exist anymore?

     yes

     Do unicorns exist?

     could be you

      Are humans extinct and we are just aliens?

     no

     Help!

     you are doing great

5.24.20  12:26 pm   What's the name of the new video you are going to release?

      'how to engulf the buffet, depending on what a buffet is'

5.24.20  12:25 pm   How can I engulf an entire buffet so no one else can eat?

      what the heck is a buffet

5.24.20  11:28 am   Am I correct in believing that your upcoming project is not just limited to one video for its impact?

      yes, this is something you may know about me, 'one' is the most miserable and sad number of videos i have ever heard of. i have been through therapy and night terrors repeatedly, trying to cope with my deep trauma and fear of the number 'one' as a number (quantity) of videos

5.24.20  10:46 am   why was anime created?

      for your benefit

5.24.20  10:39 am   what is music

      a highly customizable feels enhancer. if you present a lemon, coupled with exactly the right tailor made music, the feels of the lemon can go to upwards of 50,000,000 times their original base feel. is it the music we're feeling? technically yes, but the feelings are being anchored into a tangible mental space: the lemon. the music is enhancing and shaping the feels of the lemon. with no lemon, the music will not know which feels to enhance

5.24.20  9:41 am   Any tips for creating original basslines and/or writing a bassline to a pre-existing melody?

      'play', not 'write'. You can write it down as played, and then that's how it's written, but, .... 'playing' should be the origin

5.24.20  8:41 am   When does time stop happening and start over?

      seems like every moment

5.24.20  6:48 am   Do you have a patreon or something similar?

      yes

5.24.20  6:36 am   does pain really mean bread in french

      yes

5.24.20  6:16 am   What would happen if a unstoppable object collides with a unmovable object

      the stronger one gets to prove that the weaker one is not what it claims to be, and the stronger one also gets to have it remain secret that they're not what they claim to be either. hope that makes sense

5.24.20  5:37 am   Is 'might quit' in 3/4 or 6/8 time?

      put it this way, the number of beats per bar is NOT 3. it's either 2 or 4 (depending on your prefered bar size). but not 3. i was very careful to try to avoid any possibility of it sounding like 3. but, as you've shown, i have failed

5.24.20  4:36 am   I seem to have a hard time of it coming up with C sections for songs I am making. The B section does not tend to sound like a bridge, for example. Would you suggest any songs that would be particularly good to study to demonstrate what makes for good ABC type changes, including from your own repertoire?

      need to know more specifically what you have so far. 'sections' can take on so many different roles, and personalities, ........impossible to diagnose the patient without seeing the patient

5.24.20  3:49 am   Hello! I just came to ask, I've heard a lot of things and how you're learning a new program. If they're true and you are learning some new stuff, what kind of stuff and what program?

      already know the new program. now i am using the program to build programs, if you get what i mean

5.24.20  3:07 am   Do u think chaos is the most pure thing in the entire universe because its the only thing that existed before the universe and never changed  destruction was first that creation?

      no

5.24.20  2:38 am   How many holes does a straw have? 

      10 to the several million

5.24.20  1:37 am   How do you make your awesome vids?

      we'll see.....

5.24.20  1:07 am   favorite cereal?

      hotdog soup pizza, with pineapples

5.24.20  1:05 am   What advice do you have for someone who is lost? Aside from being found

      play a game of 'what do we know'. try to think of everything you know (about your situation) and say it

5.23.20  11:37 pm   what is the difference between shorts and pants

      the length

5.23.20  11:26 pm   why is your voice relaxing

      because i have recently heard some relaxing news, which i would like to share with you

5.23.20  10:50 pm   What is your opinion on geese

      they know how to spend their time. very good time spenders, that's what i say

5.23.20  10:30 pm   whats's your mbti? 

      eXtReMe

5.23.20  9:57 pm   How's that giant elephant you are manufacturing going?

      i'd say this is shaping up to be at least one of the top five (5) elephants

5.23.20  9:44 pm   are you learning new software that just makes the stick men 3D

      no software can do it the quite the way i want it, so i have to teach it what i want

5.23.20  9:40 pm   Favorite neon color?

      regular

5.23.20  9:14 pm   Do you have any tips on figuring out how to layer a song nicely, or come up with new chords that work well enough together to make a song off of it?

      99% of the time, i do NOT do it 'chords first'... but if i did, i would definitely make sure to use well-tested and trusted chords (not 'new'). it's like building a car........ probably wanna go with the 4 wheels format. for....reasons. ... but, back to your first question, "

Do you have any tips on figuring out how to layer a song nicely,

"  ah, i think i just realized what's going on. i think you write the song in the recording studio, where as i do not

5.23.20  9:12 pm   how difficult is it to explain what you make to your friends?

      never tried

5.23.20  8:32 pm   When will you start dropping Instagram hints?

      pretty much immediately

5.23.20  8:25 pm   ur a cool person and i admire you a lot. your brilliance never fails to amaze me. you are such an inspiration to me as both a musician and an artist. i love all of your content and everything you do in general. your existence inspires me to exist as well.

     holy evening news broadcast, you are very friendly

     on a side note, do you like to consume pianos orally?

      no

5.23.20  7:26 pm   How do I find that one tune that's stuck in my head but I don't know the name of?

      if you have no lyrics with it, you're gonna have to just run it by everyone you know and see if they recognize it

5.23.20  6:54 pm   Are microwaves underrated or overrated?

      remind me again what they are rated

5.23.20  6:49 pm   Are windows portals of eternal curiosity?

     it depends which side of the window you are on

      If not, why are curious cats so enthralled by them?

      they are enthralled by what's on the other side

5.23.20  6:29 pm   I'm scared of oboes. How can I fix this?

      you could try traveling to a distant oboe-free planet

5.23.20  5:20 pm   Is soup a cereal?

      soup is what cereal wishes it could be

5.23.20  5:12 pm   Can you predict the future?

      i can theorize about it

5.23.20  4:29 pm   How to resist the urge to jump through a window when I hear a professional mix?

      keep in mind ...... the people who did that mix might be very envious of some of the creative fervor, performances, writing, etc, that you may have going on in your song

5.23.20  4:21 pm   Why is life so weird

      to keep you always coming back for more

5.23.20  4:20 pm   why were you up so late last night

      why do you think you know how late i was up

5.23.20  4:13 pm   what was the best thing before sliced bread?

      sliced meat

5.23.20  4:06 pm   It's easy to focus on the intelligent aspects of humanity. Are you not afraid that stupidity will prevail, like in Idiocracy? There seems to be an upper bound on intelligence but no lower bound on stupidity.

      i disagree

5.23.20  4:03 pm   how have you been doing during the end of the world?

      i thought it was the beginning

5.23.20  3:38 pm   how long is the night even though its still considered day

      it varies with latitude, and season
